Reviews.Title: crap..
Reviews.Author: James H.
Reviews.Content: Piece of crap. Didn't read Sim card. Keyboard too small, battery slow. Too small.. Wouldn't recommend buying it ever. Period.

Reviews.Title: Poor Product
Reviews.Author: aaron jackson
Reviews.Content: Poor productI would not recommend this item to anyone. I purchased this product about 2 months ago and it is no longer working. When I tried to return the item to the seller sad to say I found out that the warranty was only good for about 30 days.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: brenda johnson
Reviews.Content: The item was to hard to work, if my smart grandson could not work it something is wrong, it did look nice

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: Was cheap one of them stopped working within two weeks. I would not purchase this type of item again. Just not worth it

Reviews.Title: hat it
Reviews.Author: bruce owens
Reviews.Content: not good bad hard to contrul do not by this phone  save your money i did not like this jounk

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: jean-claude
Reviews.Content: The SIM card metal comportment came out while trying to install my SIM card.  The plastic part on the SIM card comportment is broken while trying to install my SIM card

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: Tran Mitch Pham
Reviews.Content: charge it, put my chips set in use about 48 hours, then no battery, then I charged but no power takethen it stop on, then I returned in heart beat

Reviews.Title: Cool is show off but that's about it
Reviews.Author: The Hunts "The Hunts"
Reviews.Content: My son was really excited to buy the latest & greatest phone and although he was excited for the first week, he soon realized how impractical it was and switched back to a regular phone.  He couldn't really send or receive texts or access the internet.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Jakers
Reviews.Content: It is a little big but it is nice for the price you pay. I bought this for my son because he keeps getting phones lost or stolen.

Reviews.Title: Cell phone Watch
Reviews.Author: Gloria Johnson
Reviews.Content: Great product , enjoying it ! I am recommending this to family,friends and co-workers. The durabliity and style is very flexible.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: moammer
Reviews.Content: great definitely a 5 star works great all people should know about this make a video out of it and make a commercial on t.v trust me u will get a bbbbbiiiigggg big hit  it depends on u yes or no f y i its great and i am not a employe who says this right now i am a customer
